data.title: The Aristocats | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase The Aristocats on digital and stream instantly or download offline. In the heart of Paris, a kind and eccentric millionairess wills her entire estate to Duchess, her high-society cat, and her three little kittens. Laughs and adventure ensue as the greedy, bumbling butler pulls off the ultimate catnap caper. Now it's up to the rough-and-tumble alley cat, Thomas O'Malley, and his band of swingin' jazz cats to save the day.
data.text:
While the animation is cute and the film creates an incredibly likable main cast of characters each with their own unique personality and presence, the narrative is incredibly basic and lacks any deeper dimension when it comes to purpose or poignance.

August 15, 2023

I kind of feel the same way about the Aristocats as I felt about Fun, Fancy and Free. Both felt very lazy and derivative of better films.

May 8, 2019

The Aristocats is in there with the good ones. It is light and pleasant and funny, the characterization is strong, and the voices of Phil Harris and Eva Gabor are charming in their absolute rightness.

July 9, 2018

The carefully painted Paris setting has the watery air of Ardizzone, while light and colour are used beautifully throughout.

November 28, 2017

Before the disastrous Aughts, was there a worse decade for Disney animated features than the 1970s?

June 22, 2017

A cute, feline version of "Lady and the Tramp" that should enthrall families . . . and, of course, cat lovers.

June 22, 2017

Insofar as the film has any real ambition driving it, that ambition seems to be that the Disney brand name must be kept alive until somebody could figure out what to do with it.

June 22, 2017
